General.Name: Guangdong Redwall New Materials Co Ltd
General.Description: Guangdong Redwall New Materials Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of concrete admixtures in China and internationally. It offers polycarboxylate and naphthalene mother liquors, high performance and ordinary water reducers, superplasticizers, mineral functional materials, and other admixtures. The company was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Huizhou, China.
General.Address: Science and Technology Industrial Park, Huizhou, China, 516127
